award_title: Collaborative Research: ECLIPSE-CHIPS: Avoiding Contamination by Controlling Charging and Transport of Particles in Plasmas under Modulation and Afterglow Conditions
subject: Making your plasma modeling work accessible to other labs
body:
Hi Anton,

I'm Matt, building Ouro. Your work on particle behavior in plasma afterglow caught my attentionâ€”especially the simulations piece.

Here's the thing: good computational methods usually stay locked in papers. Other groups end up rebuilding from scratch instead of reusing what you've already figured out. It's wasteful, and hard to demonstrate real uptake.

Ouro wraps computational workflows in a simple API so other researchers can actually use your methods directly. Turns your work into a building block.

Curious if this resonates for your simulations? Happy to chat.

Best,
Matt

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
